history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go? For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER I'm going to Hilton Garden.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to hilton garden inn pittsburgh university place?
USER Yes.
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER I'm leaving from airport.
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from pittsburgh international airport?
USER That's correct.
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 04:19 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 4 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/>If you would like to go by driving instead, please say start over, and then choose driving directions.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue at McKee Pl.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 5:00pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER the meeting you
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER I'm down.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 1 min to 3454 Forbes avenue, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, USA. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
